title: Broken
description: My name is Lauren. You’ve met my daughter, Abigail. She is pretty amazing isn’t she? My life took a path I didn’t expect. A path I had no say in. Before it’s too late, I want the chance to explain why I lied and took away Doug’s chance to be a father. The saying goes, there are two sides to every story and this is mine.Book three in The Connected Series. Coming January 2015.
author: K.A. Hobbs
